meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the study of diseases related to the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunopathologists conducted research on immune system diseases.
meanings.sent2: Many immunopathologists work in hospitals to help patients with immune disorders.
meanings.sent3: The immunopathologists joked that they were like immune system detectives.
meanings.sent4: In the medical field, immunopathologists are the guardians of immune health.
meanings.sent5: The immunopathologists' dedication to understanding immune diseases is commendable.
